film.Title: Joker
film.Description: Forever alone in a crowd, failed comedian Arthur Fleck seeks connection as he walks the streets of Gotham City. Arthur wears two masks -- the one he paints for his day job as a clown, and the guise he projects in a futile attempt to feel like he's part of the world around him. Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

film.Title: Fast 8 [Fast and furious]
film.Description: Dom encounters a mysterious woman, Cipher, who gets him involved in the world of terrorism. The crew has to reunite to stop Cipher and save the man who brought them together as a family.

film.Title: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
film.Description: To All the Boys I've Loved Before is an American teen romance film directed by Susan Johnson and written by Sofia Alvarez. The film is about a teenage girl where her secret love letters are exposed and wreaked havoc on her love life.

film.Title: Avengers: Endgame
film.Description: After Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, disintegrates half of the universe, the Avengers must reunite and assemble again to reinvigorate their trounced allies and restore balance.

film.Title: Wonder Woman
film.Description: Princess Diana of an all-female Amazonian race rescues US pilot Steve. Upon learning of a war, she ventures into the world of men to stop Ares, the god of war, from destroying mankind.
